title: Jargon
description: A bot that analyses terms-and-conditions and provides a summary of the key points using Named Entity Recognition.

title: ChokeSpeare
description: A comparative analysis of several generative and non-generative models in generating poems. Models include Simple NNs to LSTMs and Transformers. All the models are implemented from scratch.

title: SuitUp
description: A Generative AI based job searching engine. All you need to do is plug in your resume and watch it get to work!
